page.title: 15Trade in the area
page.content:
There are only 6 shops in the area. In{Waltham St Lawrence}there is the{ {Post Office}which also sells potted plants; a{General Store}which sells a wide variety of foods, fruit and vegetables, hardware and household goods; and an{Agricultural Merchant} which sells grains, animal feeds, fertilizers and gardening supplies.
In{Shurlock Row}there are three shops. The{Post Office}also acts as a{ {Newsagent}and{General Store}selling food, sweets and household items while next door is a{Butcher's Shop}which sells a wide variety of meat and cheeses. There is also a small{ {General Store}run from a back garden which caters for the old people of the area and sends them free deliveries.
